wide ： 常用词，侧重指两边或两点之间的距离。着重距离的远近。

jx.jx_en_mean: a long way away from an intended target

jx.jx_en_mean: offering a great variety of opportunities

entry.def: Something that is wide measures a large distance from one side or edge to the other.

example.ex: All worktops should be wide enough to allow plenty of space for food preparation.
example.tran: 所有的厨房操作台都应该足够宽大，为制作食物提供足够的空间。

entry.def: A wide smile is one in which your mouth is stretched because you are very pleased or amused.

example.ex: It brought a wide smile to his face and laughter to his eyes...
His face broke into a wide grin.
example.tran: 他脸上绽放出灿烂的笑容。

entry.def: If you open or spread something wide, you open or spread it as far as possible or to the fullest extent.
entry.tran: 张开很大的;完全张开的

example.ex: 'It was huge,' he announced, spreading his arms wide...
example.tran: “它很大很大”，他边说边伸开手臂比划着。

entry.def: You use wide to talk or ask about how much something measures from one side or edge to the other.

example.ex: The road is only one track wide.
example.tran: 这条路只有一个车道那么宽。

entry.def: You use wide to describe something that includes a large number of different things or people.
entry.tran: 范围广的;包容的;广泛的

example.ex: The brochure offers a wide choice of hotels, apartments and holiday homes...
example.tran: 这本小册子提供了很多宾馆、公寓、度假屋供选择。

example.ex: The proposed constitution gives him much wider powers than his predecessor.
example.tran: 宪法提案赋予他比前任大得多的权力。

entry.def: You use wide to say that something is found, believed, known, or supported by many people or throughout a large area.
entry.tran: 广泛的;广为流传的;广为人知的

example.ex: The case has attracted wide publicity...
example.tran: 这个案子吸引了广泛的关注。

example.ex: I suspect this book will have the widest appeal of all...
example.tran: 我猜想这本书会引起大家最广泛的兴趣。

entry.def: A wide difference or gap between two things, ideas, or qualities is a large difference or gap.

example.ex: Research shows a wide difference in tastes around the country...
example.tran: 研究表明全国各地的口味大有不同。

example.ex: There are wide variations caused by different academic programme structures.
example.tran: 不同的教学项目结构造成了巨大的差异。

entry.def: Wider is used to describe something which relates to the most important or general parts of a situation, rather than to the smaller parts or to details.
entry.tran: 更大的;更多的;更广泛的

example.ex: He emphasised the wider issue of superpower cooperation...
example.tran: 他强调了超级大国合作这一更重要的议题。

example.ex: Oakley locates housework in the wider context of economic, social and political structures.
example.tran: 奥克利把家务置于更广泛的经济、社会和政治结构背景中。

entry.def: If something such as a shot or punch is wide, it does not hit its target but lands to the right or left of it.
entry.tran: 未击中目标的;未打中的

example.ex: Nearly half the missiles landed wide.
example.tran: 有近一半的导弹落点出现偏差。

means.word_mean: 1. having great (or a certain) extent from one side to the other;

sentences.sentence: "a panoptic study of Soviet nationality"- T.G.Winner

means.word_mean: 3. (used of eyes) fully open or extended;
4. very large in expanse or scope;

sentences.sentence: "the arrow was wide of the mark"
"a claim that was wide of the truth"

means.word_mean: 1. with or by a broad space;

sentences.sentence: "the arrow went wide of the mark"
"a bullet went astray and killed a bystander"

means.word_mean: 4. to or over a great extent or range; far;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wīd 'spacious, extensive', wīde 'over a large area', of Germanic origin

sentences.cn: 也许我们的心里没有一个固定的家,但我们身边有一个广阔的世界.
sentences.en: Maybe we haven't a fixed home in heart but we have a wide world around.

sentences.cn: 如梅: 我巴不得现在就到广阔的田野里去.
sentences.en: Rumei: I can't wait to go out into the wide open spaces.

sentences.cn: 在2002年乌干达开始广泛地使用针对Hib的疫苗接种.
sentences.en: Uganda began wide spread child vaccinations against HIB Hib in 2002.

sentences.cn: 它的研究性和自主性的特点被广泛地认可.
sentences.en: The quality of its research and its independence are wide recognized.

sentences.cn: 诺尔·约翰森与胡利特就共同关心的问题进行了广泛地交谈.
sentences.en: Nowell Johnson had a talk with Hewlett far and wide for the concerned problems.

sentences.cn: 银行业广泛地显现出了持久的 窘迫 迹象.
sentences.en: Banks far and wide are showing enduring signs ofdistress ( see article ) .

sentences.cn: 富兰克林相当广泛地研究和观察自然现象.
sentences.en: Franklin to a wide range of research and observation of natural phenomena.

sentences.cn: 太阳能也已被广泛地应用于家庭热水系统和街道及高速公路照明.
sentences.en: Solar energy is in wide use for domestic water heating to powering street and highway lights.

sentences.cn: 电子计算机已越来越广泛地在各个领域得到应用.
sentences.en: Computer has found an increasingly wide utilization in all fields.

sentences.cn: 随着经济建设速度的不断加快, 阻燃线缆被广泛地应用于各种场合.
sentences.en: With the rapid development of the construction industry, flame retardant cables find wider and wider use.

sentences.cn: 无内胎轮胎-其中后方的是更广泛地赋予额外的稳定-加强安全.
sentences.en: Tubeless tyres – among which the rear ones are wider endowing extra stability – enhance safety.

sentences.cn: 安全部队正在更广泛地布网。
sentences.en: The security forces are casting their net wider.

sentences.cn: 他们需要卡车把产品运往这一广阔地区里的各个地方.
sentences.en: They needed trucks to distribute their produce over this wide area.

sentences.cn: 我们的警察分布在一个广阔地区.
sentences.en: Our policemen were disbursed over a wide area.
